channel.title: Tethering is now easier on iOS & Android with Pair & Share in Speedify 14
channel.description:
Note: as of 14.0.1, speed is limited to 10Mbit for sharing per device, hotspot method is still needed for high speed bonding.
Sharing your cellular from your phone using hotspot or USB tethering is now optional. Simply install Speedify on your phone and connect your phone's Wi-Fi to SmoothWAN's access point then pair. Your phone will share it's cellular over SmoothWAN's access point. A.K.A reverse tethering.
You can still use the hotspot method if you need to share your phone's connected Wi-Fi connection*, this will replace the need to use USB Wi-Fi dongle on your SmoothWAN appliance.
*Applicable to mid-high end Android smartphones and iPhones that can do hotspot + client mode simultaneously.
